MAIN_PAGE.TITLE: Poly Quiz
MAIN_PAGE.SUBTITLE: Challenge your friends in real-time quiz battles
MAIN_PAGE.JOIN_DESC: Enter a match and compete with other players
MAIN_PAGE.CREATE_DESC: Design your own quiz with custom questions
MAIN_PAGE.ADMIN_DESC: Edit, organize and review your game library

TITLES.WAITING_ROOM: Waiting for the start of the game
TITLES.VALID_TEAMS: Each team must have exactly two players. Empty teams will be ignored.
TITLES.MIN_TEAM_PLAYERS: A minimum of four players is required to start a team game.

NEW_GAME_NAME.NAME_EXISTS: The name of the game already exists

JOIN_MATCH.INCORRECT_NAME: The name entered is invalid or already exists ! Please choose a new name

GENERAL.ERROR: The operation could not be completed. If the problem persists, please contact support.
GENERAL.NAME: Name

ERROR_MESSAGE_FOR.NAME: A name is required
ERROR_MESSAGE_FOR.NAME_TYPE: A name in text format is required
ERROR_MESSAGE_FOR.DESCRIPTION_TYPE: A description in text format is required
ERROR_MESSAGE_FOR.QCM_TIME: The time for the QCM must be between 10 and 60 seconds
ERROR_MESSAGE_FOR.QCM_TIME_TYPE: A number for the QCM time is required
ERROR_MESSAGE_FOR.QUESTIONS: The game must have at least one valid question
ERROR_MESSAGE_FOR.QUESTION_TYPE: A table of questions is required
ERROR_MESSAGE_FOR.IMPORT_FAILED_INVALID_JSON: The import failed because the JSON is invalid
ERROR_MESSAGE_FOR.INVALID_FILE_TYPE: Only PNG and JPG files are accepted.
ERROR_MESSAGE_FOR.GAME_CANCELLED: The game was cancelled by the organizer.

ERROR_TITLE.CREATE_GAME: The game creation failed due to the following errors:
ERROR_TITLE.GAME_NOT_ACCESSIBLE: This game is no longer accessible. Please choose another game from the following list.
ERROR_TITLE.GAME_NOT_FOUND: The game was not found. Please choose another game from the following list.
ERROR_TITLE.QCM_TIME_INVALID: The QCM time must be between 10 and 60 seconds.
ERROR_TITLE.GAME_ALREADY_DELETED: This game has already been deleted.
ERROR_TITLE.GAME_DELETE_ERROR: Error occurred while deleting the game.

ERROR_QUESTION.SAVE: Saving the question failed due to the following errors:
ERROR_QUESTION.POINTS: The points assigned to the question must be between 10 and 100 points.
ERROR_QUESTION.TYPE: The question type has not been selected.
ERROR_QUESTION.ALL_CHOICES: The text for one or more answer choices has not been entered.
ERROR_QUESTION.UNIQUE_CHOICE: Each answer choice must contain a unique response.
ERROR_QUESTION.CORRECT_CHOICE: The question must have at least one correct answer among the choices.
ERROR_QUESTION.WRONG_CHOICE: The question must have at least one incorrect answer among the choices.
ERROR_QUESTION.CHOICES: The question must include answer choices.
ERROR_QUESTION.TOLERANCE: The tolerance must not exceed 25% of the interval.
ERROR_QUESTION.LOWER_BOUND: The lower bound must be less than or equal to the correct answer.
ERROR_QUESTION.UPPER_BOUND: The upper bound must be greater than or equal to the correct answer.
ERROR_QUESTION.ALL_RESPONSES: All fields in the QRE must be filled.
ERROR_QUESTION.LOWER_GREATER_THAN_UPPER: The lower bound must be less than the upper bound.

DIALOG_MESSAGE.CONFIRMATION: Are you sure that you want to

FRIENDS.NO_REQUESTS_SUBTITLE: When someone sends you a friend request, it will appear here.
FRIENDS.NO_USERS_SUBTITLE: Try a different search term to find people in the community.
FRIENDS.NO_FRIENDS_SUBTITLE: Discover new people and send them a friend request to get started!
FRIENDS.NO_BLOCKED_SUBTITLE: Users you block will appear here. You can unblock them at any time.

PRICE_WON.WON_PRICE: You also win 2/3 of the cookies from the entry prices.
PRICE_WON.LOST_PRICE: You also win a consolation prize of cookies.

EVALUATION.TITLE: Rate out of 5 stars and choose a tag
